price: Na usemi wake (Mtume) ni: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika hawa ni watu wasio amini.
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: Naapa kwa kauli ya Muhammad s.a.w. anapo omba na kuita: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika hawa wenye inda ni watu wasio tarajiwa kuamini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
